title: Bullet states lagging behind by one step (simulation timestep)

content.raw:
Split off from issue #1081, currently a blocker for bullet dynamics.

Failing tests that demonstrates this bug:

  * [PhysicsLinkTest::SetVelocity](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bcf8ac5600111f9f4f4093826c4574e961e88db8/test/integration/physics_link.cc?at=bullet_screw_joint#cl-82)
  * [PhysicsTest::SimplePushTest](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bcf8ac5600111f9f4f4093826c4574e961e88db8/test/integration/physics.cc?at=bullet_screw_joint#cl-1333).  Note this test [was moved](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/6082035).
  * [JointTestScrew::ScrewJointForce](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bcf8ac5600111f9f4f4093826c4574e961e88db8/test/integration/joint_screw.cc?at=bullet_screw_joint#cl-171)
  * [JointTestUniversal::UniversalJointForce](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/4a4dc5c940cbb977700040c5492eb1401625da4f/test/integration/joint_universal.cc?at=bullet_universal_joint#cl-246)
  * [JointTestUniversal::UniversalJointSetWorldPose](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/066f8bc2b2ad6320843412b161792229bff31229/test/integration/joint_universal.cc?at=bullet_universal_joint#cl-238)

I am unclear if the buggy behavior originates from bad gazebo integration or from upstream physics internals.
content.html:
Split off from issue #1081, currently a blocker for bullet dynamics.

Failing tests that demonstrates this bug:

  • PhysicsLinkTest::SetVelocity
  • PhysicsTest::SimplePushTest. Note this test was moved.
  • JointTestScrew::ScrewJointForce
  • JointTestUniversal::UniversalJointForce
  • JointTestUniversal::UniversalJointSetWorldPose

I am unclear if the buggy behavior originates from bad gazebo integration or from upstream physics internals.
